name: "Spa"ctacular Frozen Grapes
author: Michel Brewer
summary: These grapes were served to me after a massage at my local spa. This recipe is perfect as an after-school snack, a simple appetizer at parties, or a sweet treat before bed. Substitute Splenda® for the sugar if you like! Can be kept in a sealed bag in the freezer for several months.
directions: Remove grapes from stems and place in a colander
Place grapes in a gallon-size resealable bag
Pour sugar into the bag and seal
Gently shake the bag to evenly coat grapes with sugar
Arrange grapes on a paper towel to air-dry any remaining water, about 15 minutes
Place grapes in a single layer on a shallow pan or baking sheet
